alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued June 07 at 4:42PM EDT until June 08 at 7:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 AM EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (5.1 to 5.3 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Nantucket County. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 AM EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor coastal flooding begins on Easy Street in Nantucket. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 07/04 PM 3.9/ 4.4 0.2/ 0.8 1.1/ 1.6 2 None 08/04 AM 5.0/ 5.5 1.4/ 1.9 1.2/ 1.7 2 Minor 08/05 PM 4.0/ 4.5 0.5/ 1.0 1.2/ 1.7 2 None 09/05 AM 4.6/ 5.1 1.0/ 1.5 1.0/ 1.5 2 Minor 09/06 PM 4.0/ 4.5 0.4/ 0.9 1.0/ 1.5 1 None 10/06 AM 4.5/ 5.0 0.9/ 1.4 1.0/ 1.5 1 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
